p: The isolated compound 347, which was obtained in sufficient amounts, was evaluated for antimicrobial activities against S. aureus ATCC25923 and methicillin-resistant S. aureus. Simplicildone A 347 displayed weak antibacterial against Staphylococcus aureus with MIC value of 32 µg/mL. Vancomycin which was used as positive control for bacteria, displayed the MIC values of 0.5 µg/mL and 1.0 µg/mL against both S. aureus and methicillin-resistant S. aureus [ 63].
